com.perfectoMobile.deviceMaintenance.listener

Interface DeviceActionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDeviceActionListener, DefaultDeviceActionListener

    public interface DeviceActionListener
    The listener interface for receiving deviceAction events. The class that is interested in processing a deviceAction event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addDeviceActionListener method. When the deviceAction event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
